text: Amar Sharadrao Kale is a member of the 13th Maharashtra Legislative Assembly. He represents the Arvi Assembly Constituency. He belongs to the Indian National Congress. ==References== Category:Members of the Maharashtra Legislative Assembly Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2014–2019 Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:Living people Category:People from Wardha district Category:Marathi politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Amar Sharadrao Kale
